title: Tokunbo and the Bolt of Lightning
description: A teenage girl, a sea priestess, and a quest to the underworld make for an adventurous journey in the second installment of the Risen Evil series. “She’s your source of life.”When Iyun, a sea priestess, shows up in Tokunbo’s room after a chilling nightmare, Tokunbo’s life changes forever. Soon she finds out there’s a thin line between life and death and that her source of life is trapped in the underworld.Thrust into the shocking world of folktales coming to life, a fierce battle with diminutive gnomes, spirits with wolfish eyes and the trickster’s minions, she allies with the sea priestess, Iyun, and sets out on a quest across the country to prevent a catastrophic disaster from sweeping millions of lives away.
author: Esosa Kolawole
